entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 9:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -9.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -11.2°C
Wind: WSW 26 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
